flow.descriptionCdata:
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.0bb71e85-0203-47c4-ba57-eabb7ead77e4.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.13bd2b77-55fc-48f7-be18-2351b90adf5d.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.146e33d3-27ac-4b95-b39f-5e040f9dabbb.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.1560c3a7-d2ac-4a4e-8e5f-718bf476427c.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.1561516c-1ace-4672-8f68-0b98cdba73cf.prompt=Enter a value for authType e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.15ba4ccf-98cb-4299-bf15-1bc1d16a52cb.prompt=Enter a value for proxy e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.1a964e8c-c2f5-4951-bcae-d012cd8c9155.prompt=User Identifier e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.1d5a8d2b-c9d7-4c93-a8ed-dd4d2d96687c.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.21a0155e-7dc4-4b94-a33f-e7e2cbc46675.prompt=User Identifier e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.227bb96a-d743-4d41-8e6d-153b60969af7.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.2415a711-08f2-4eb3-ad8c-94293fce6b49.prompt=Enter a value for timeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.24b9cfe5-ce16-41c0-b2a3-d3ede6a4c665.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.2578e42a-e195-485d-a14f-95385aa9bafe.prompt=Enter a value for authType e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.29dca7f3-7647-4b14-ac6f-514411a31b9a.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.313d4315-c26a-4ea0-b8de-6afb087a8c0d.prompt=Enter a value for timeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.36365012-cc70-4f99-9673-3d1de19a1b4f.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.393d16d7-cd5c-4eb8-85bc-80914f19a932.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.3f5abca3-6696-420b-8c36-b48d1d015412.prompt=Enter a value for keystore e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.41e151a6-e018-4c58-b6f0-6474afe8d5be.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-

userIdentifier  - User Identifier id

Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type

document  – returned XML document from API
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.4322837b-1217-4002-abef-bf58a9a3a354.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.4e454251-5b9b-4fae-a199-dc09a649e80f.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.4f252937-8fb2-4bfd-a7f7-d0ed5e72661d.prompt=User Identifier e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.5247c6bc-6242-4c06-9532-503cfd5c40f6.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.54942b7c-d99a-41cd-bd6e-2508918c8347.prompt=Enter a value for timeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.573b2712-e0e3-4165-bf79-ed1a00bfad84.prompt=Enter a value for authType e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.59cc5143-498a-42a0-bf6d-4723abae06e4.prompt=Resource Provider ID e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.5e2f02fb-d6e7-410e-85ec-185e51d2f001.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.60b47eda-3c04-4fac-a621-c67bd3e7b366.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.6486692a-fc53-4d07-b722-af6c0eed7b8a.prompt=Process Instance ID e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.66be5b61-7a29-434e-8318-6cef4981ab7e.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.677dd867-5320-4b73-981b-e44bf5dd4310.prompt=Process Instance ID e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.6c8c7080-bb4a-4906-b3a5-32a455da495f.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.6d112d1f-1e35-4bcd-85f4-babfd6e587dc.prompt=Process Instance ID e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.706376f2-6d16-4919-adf9-bc3323f558ed.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.722d46d1-a05b-419a-8d64-40f598250123.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.72fe3560-89ba-4ceb-b72e-8edbaf723c50.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.7496fcc6-076a-4e89-9c8f-de0ca7c9e5d1.prompt=User Identifier e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.796a88e8-fcea-4aa1-8431-fe63f35dcf13.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.7c0426a8-813a-4f2c-8bef-7f79af5a46a9.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.7dce2b06-3377-49b3-b60f-7e632bfb5464.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.80e38e99-1411-4d05-9732-770804720ad1.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.837bb3fd-1085-45ad-8de4-f26c097ac8b6.prompt=Enter a value for keystore e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.848c145f-f312-451e-8f9a-f733217319a7.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.85ead063-526f-468d-bb56-b56ea9b538ed.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.8650d2ea-4169-49cd-9179-f204386c8bdd.prompt=Enter a value for authType e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.892b9022-81fb-4c86-adaa-24e8fc183d36.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.8e364840-7ad9-4aa2-9b84-729d370db15f.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.8eba0f6f-09bb-4029-86f0-fb7c54154cff.description=
This flow runs a flex up cpu or a flex down cpu action on a target VM. The user input for cpuCount is taken as the desired state of the target VM. If the desired state and the actual state is the same, then the user input is ignored.

Inputs\:
host		\: The hostname or IP address of the vCenter provider
user		\: The name of the user account to login to the vCenter provider
password		\: The password of the user account to login to the vCenter provider
cpuCount		\: The cpu in number that the server should be flex to
virtualMachine	\: The ID of the target VM on which flex cpu action should be run
vmDatacenter	\: The name of the data center that contains the target VM
port		\: The port used by the vCenter provider
protocol		\: The protocol used by the vCenter provider
availableCPU		\: The cpu that is available for flex operations on the vCenter provider. If set to -1, then the vCenter will not be checked to see if it has the cpu required for a successful flex up cpu action.

Response\:
success		\: Flex cpu action succeeded for the target VM
ignored		\: Flex cpu action was not executed on the target VM as it has the same cpu configuration as the desired configuration
failure		\: Flex cpu failed on the target VM
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.9329e69a-4cdd-4800-ad66-79f94d7df7fd.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.95282bd6-f342-404e-8308-bf88596a2ba5.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.961ec77a-594f-4e48-aacb-c4ff854cc896.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.96cb8a01-40ca-4934-94f8-80aa1182ca3b.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.96d5d8c6-63ce-4557-bc4b-8dcae0284d0f.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.973f594a-baa5-47c7-8c5b-dced9c22c2d2.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.9747b2d6-4141-4ff4-8b00-7a38bf813ea6.prompt=Enter a value for proxy e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.9860cb60-e864-4b61-9a27-e473ebac5ede.description=
This workflow returns the list of Artifact’s Properties and values.

Inputs-
artifactId  –  Artifact id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
propertyNames – List of property names separated by pipe |
If user provides this inputs, flow will return the values for given property names only. Otherwise flow will return all properties and values for the given artifact.
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
propertyNameValuesList – List of property Names and values
E.g. property 1;value1,value2|property 2;value3|property 3;value3,value4|........

a value for trustAllRoots e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.d47407cb-24e0-4202-81ea-7c60f620d923.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.d52fb1f9-2768-4dfd-ba8d-f56bfe8dc227.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.dac0e8bb-9fe3-4590-8f07-18f6224c3a47.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.dde94c6b-0d03-4991-90da-75863ddc4eca.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.ddea5cbc-23c7-4994-95c2-07137079022c.prompt=Artifact ID e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.de7ea235-43fe-443a-90b3-37fb1f027a91.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.description=
This flow will flex up or flex down the cpu configuration of a server. The user is expected to enter the cpu in number that the servers should have. The flow will then apply this input as the final state of the cpu for the server. If the cpu of the server is less than the user input, then the server cpu will be flexed up to the input. If the cpu is lesser, then the server cpu will be flexed down to the input. No changes will be made if the input and the current configuration are the same.

The flex up and flex down operations will execute whether the server is running, suspended or in switched off state.
The maximum number that can be given as input for a flex up operation depends on the underlying configured vCenter.

Inputs\:
CPU_COUNT		\: The CPU in number that the server should be set to.
CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success		\: The flex up/flex down operation succeeded on the server
failure		\: The flex up/flex down operation may have failed on the server
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.e7df6c1a-8646-4c63-b000-6a3409e158ec.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.e8d352b5-c83c-4b1d-bc8c-8ea9ec671fb2.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.e915e84e-c8d3-40f8-9723-78aa882b6f86.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.eac44a0a-4125-4cd1-b614-5ca8796c2e49.prompt=Enter a value for timeout e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.ed6eb585-33c9-4d6a-9e17-6068e87069a9.prompt=Desired CPU count (number)\: e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.f483ceb6-dbd0-4751-846f-4e24fb5fa1dc.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.f5e4dcde-f542-4064-a4cc-9986cd8a5ce8.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.f9223c04-ad4f-421e-b466-aa27e233cf86.prompt=User Identifier e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.fb25036b-b3c2-49cb-b2f5-9e0e7f56a4eb.description=
This workflow adds/updates the service component property using Artifact API.

Inputs-
componentId – Service Component  id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
displayName - Property Display Name to  add or update
propertyName – Property Name to add or update
onlyUpdate\: yes/no 
yes - To update values of existing property (In this case input "valueType" is not required , This input will not be considered even if provided)
no - To add/update property
valueType - Value type of the property. It can have value from selection list "HP CSA – Property ValueType". This Input is required only when Input "onlyUpdate" is selected as "no".
values - One or more values delimited by comma , (If user want to use some other separator for multiple values then needs to be pass as next input "separator")
separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the values ( default delimiter used is comma ,)
consumerVisible - Do you want to make property visible on consumer portal? (true/false), Default set to true
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
document  – returned XML document from API
e04b8d2a-d7aa-4be9-a09d-0cfb27414790.ff9bbf9b-1a9e-408c-b873-68559835c746.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects
